item.val: Okinawa Scuba Diving Course – SEASIR Group
Okinawa PADI 5 Star Instructor Development Resort, provide English, Mandarin, Cantonese and Japanese diving courses
PADI diving courses with English, Mandarin & Cantonese speaking Instructor.

We offer international recognized certification PADI in our training facility. Our friendly and experience instructors conducting courses in Japanese, English, Mandarin, Cantonese and Bahasa Malaysia.

• Day 1 - Academic session & Confined water training (Pool training half day)
  • Day 2 - Open Water training dive 1 & 2
  • Day 3 - Open Water training dive 3 & 4
Above training schedule is design for home study program or PADI e-Learning program, for more information please Contact us for detail and arragement.

• Please refer SEASIR Health Check List.If any of the questions in the Health Check List answer apply “YES” to you, we must request that you consult with a physician and provide a proper document from your physician prior to participating in scuba diving training program.
  • Any courses date that fall in Peak Season in Season Calendar course fee add JPY5,000 per each candidate.
  • 2 Passport size photograph.
  • Class start with minimum 2 candidates. If only 1 candidate please Contact us for arrangement.
Use of Scuba equipment during training
Lunch box for open water training days

• Boat Dive
  • Drift Dive
  • Peak performance Buoyancy Dive
  • Search and Recovery Dive
  • Underwater naturalist Dive
  • Underwater Digital Photography Dive
  • Night Dive

• Please refer SEASIR Health Check List.If any of the questions in the Health Check List answer apply “YES” to you, we must request that you consult with a physician and provide a proper document from your physician prior to participating in scuba diving training program.
  • Any courses date that fall in Peak Season in Season Calendar course fee add JPY5,000 per each candidate.
  • Valid PADI Open Water Diver license or equivalent.
  • 2 Passport size photograph.
• Half day hand on training on primary and secondary care theory and pratical

• Day 1 - Academic session & 2 session practical training
  • Day 2 - 3 session practical training

• Please refer SEASIR Health Check List.If any of the questions in the Health Check List answer apply “YES” to you, we must request that you consult with a physician and provide a proper document from your physician prior to participating in scuba diving training program.
  • Any courses date that fall in Peak Season in Season Calendar course fee add JPY5,000 per each candidate.
  • Valid PADI Advanced license or equivalent + PADI EFR (Medic First Aid) / CPR Rescue License or equivalent CPR certificate that recognized by PADI local office
  • 2 Passport size photograph.
